'''Hidden in Plain Sight''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete ''[[Bantan Sango Case File: Case-Closing Time]].''

==Trivia==
*The Chinese and Japanese names of this achievement are a reference to the {{w|Case Closed|Detective Conan}} movie {{w|Case Closed: Captured in Her Eyes}} ({{Lang|mini=1|ja=名探偵コナン 瞳の中の暗殺者|ja_rm=Meitantei Conan: Hitomi no Naka no Ansatsusha}}).
